creator: qa.bgonepudi@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

I am trying to record for Siteminder applications and i am getting internal server error after clicking on Log on button in login page. I have added HTTP REquest Defaults, HTTP Cookie Manager & HTTP Header Manager. I would be so glab if someone can help me with it.

Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Please use Mailing list for your question .
Regards
